entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 5:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: E 19 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
